title: Solar Orbiter Level 2 Magnetometer Data in Spacecraft Reference Frame in Normal Mode - T. Horbury (The Blackett Laboratory, Imperial College London)

info.x_cadence_note: Counts based on variable 'EPOCH' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/solar-orbiter/mag/science/l2/srf-normal/2020/solo_l2_mag-srf-normal_20200415_v02.cdf. The most common cadence, 125004351 [ns] = PT0.125004S, occurred for 48.7509% of the 336954 timesteps.
info.contact: T. Horbury @ The Blackett Laboratory, Imperial College London

parameters.name: Time
parameters.x_description: Epoch encoded as Terrestrial Time on rotating Earth geoid, ns since J2000

parameters.name: B_SRF
parameters.description: Magnetic field vector in spacecraft reference frame
